data.title: Afonso II 'The Fat' King of Portugal + Urraca Princess of Castille
data.meta_description: Afonso II 'The Fat' King of Portugal, b.abt 1185, Coimbra, Centro, Portugal, son of Sancho I of Portugal + Dulce of Aragon; + Urraca Princess of Castille, b.abt 1185, Toledo, La Mancha, Spain
data.text:
Grand

ParentsAlfonso I "The Conqueror" Henriquez King of Portugal + Maud de SavoyRaimond V Berenger + Petronilla de AragonSancho III Alfonsez King of Castile + Blanche Garcia of NavarreHenry II King of England + Eleanor of AquitaineTo suggest changes to these records, login & edit by choosing options to edit, & your suggested changes will be saved for the record moderator to review.
